trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuItemAutomationPeer"></xref> class.

trans-unit.source: The element associated with this automation peer.
trans-unit.target: L'elemento associato a questo peer di automazione.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer"></xref> for the specified item.
trans-unit.target: Crea un nuovo <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer"> </xref> per l'elemento specificato.
